info.delete: Are you sure you want to delete game {{name}}?

summary.label: Match Overview
summary.description: Will be displayed in the match list

invite_code.label: Invitation Code
invite_code.description: Leave empty for no invitation code

writeup_deadline.label: Writeup Submission Time
writeup_deadline.description: Hours allowed to submit Writeup after the match ends

organizations.label: Candidate Organization List
organizations.description: Add your organization to open group list

practice_mode.label: Practice Mode
practice_mode.description: You can still view topics and submit them after the match ends

container_limit.label: Team Container Limit
container_limit.description: Number of containers shared by teams (0 = unlimited)

writeup_required.label: Writeup required
writeup_required.description: Whether to enable competition's Writeup submission

accept_without_review.label: Team Registration is not moderated
accept_without_review.description: Set to Accept status directly after team registration

empty.title: No announcement yet
empty.description: Click on the top right button to create a new announcement

notices.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this notification?
